ABE.VI.summary: AB Effectenbeteiligungen, AG invests in companies and securities. Its investments in companies include European small-cap and micro-cap companies, medium-sized companies with growth potential, and pre-initial public offering companies. The company invests in various securities, such as shares on international stock exchanges, fixed-interest securities, and hedging operations. Its investment portfolio includes hospital operators, providers of technological products and services for the industrial sector, building constructors, and infrastructure management software companies. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Mondsee, Austria.

UIV.VI.summary: Unternehmens Invest AG is a private equity firm specializing in growth capital, expansion, buyout, succession, spin-offs, turnaround, industry consolidation, demerger, and crisis situation investments. The firm prefers to make long-term, buy and build investments in national and international mature medium to larger sized enterprises. The firm seeks to invest primarily in automobile sector. It also holds investments in various growth companies in the technology sector to maintain strategic options for further involvement in this area. The firm considers investments in companies having headquarters in Austria, Germany, and Switzerland. It typically invests in companies with sales revenue between Â15 million ($16.57 million) and Â150 million ($165.7 million) and an EBITDA margin of up to 10 percent. The firm aims for majority investments in its portfolio companies. The firm seeks to make balance sheet investments. The firm prefers investing in B2C and B2B companies. The firm prefers taking an exit either by initial public offering of the shareholding or its sale to a large-scale investor. Unternehmens Invest AG was founded in 1990 and is based in Vienna, Austria. It operates as a subsidiary.
